name: gearjs
description: A web UI for gears and other things

scripts.dist: npm run build && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp index.html dist/ && cp -R ./js dist/js && cp -R ./css dist/css && cp -R ./escapement dist/escapement && cp -R ./img dist/img && cp -R ./ratchet dist/ratchet
scripts.push-lhi-dry: npm run dist && rm -rf ../localhuman.industries/staticexport/gears && mkdir ../localhuman.industries/staticexport/gears && cp -R dist/* ../localhuman.industries/staticexport/gears && aws s3 sync ../localhuman.industries/staticexport s3://localhuman.industries --dryrun
scripts.push-lhi: npm run dist && rm -rf ../localhuman.industries/staticexport/gears && mkdir ../localhuman.industries/staticexport/gears && cp -R dist/* ../localhuman.industries/staticexport/gears && aws s3 sync ../localhuman.industries/staticexport s3://localhuman.industries
